Regulation Name(s): Micro Chemistry Analyzer for Clinical Use
Instrument(s)/Platform(s): Laptop computer (JBAIDS software v2.1 or higher)
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for the JBAIDS Anthrax Detection System utilizing real-time PCR for qualitative detection of Bacillus anthracis DNA in blood and cultures
Indications for Use Summary: Qualitative in vitro diagnostic detection of Bacillus anthracis DNA targets (pXO1 and pXO2 plasmids) in whole blood (sodium citrate), positive blood cultures, and cultured organisms on blood agar from individuals suspected of anthrax; used as presumptive identification alongside culture and other laboratory tests
